guide.title: Gentoo herds project
guide.abstract: The herds project aims to ensure that ebuilds are organised in groups which have maintainers, and that some ebuilds get maintainers assigned

body.p: The herds project aims to ensure that the growing number of ebuilds do not overwelm the gentoo project. To this end the herds project aims for the development of infrastructure that will help manage the collection of ebuilds
